Volume 18 Issue 1 Link: https://www.virosin.org/article/2003/1

February 2003

MO Xiao, QIN Xi, YANG Cheng, DUAN Yu-qi, WU Juan, LI Tian-fei, WU Jian-yu, CHEN Hai-ru.Cloning and Analysis of Partial Genome Sequence of Tobacco vein distorting virus [J].VIROLOGICA SINICA, 2003, 18(1): 58-62.

Citation: MO Xiao, QIN Xi, YANG Cheng, DUAN Yu-qi, WU Juan, LI Tian-fei, WU Jian-yu, CHEN Hai-ru. Cloning and Analysis of Partial Genome Sequence of Tobacco vein distorting virus [J].VIROLOGICA SINICA, 2003, 18(1) : 58-62.

Cloning and Analysis of Partial Genome Sequence of Tobacco vein distorting virus

  • MO Xiao , 
  • QIN Xi , 
  • YANG Cheng , 
  • DUAN Yu-qi , 
  • WU Juan , 
  • LI Tian-fei , 
  • WU Jian-yu , 
  • CHEN Hai-ru 2
  • 1.

    1．Biotechnology Laboratory and Agricultural Institute of Yunnan Academy of Tobacco Science，Kunming 650106， China

  • 2.

    Key Laboratory ofPhytopathology，Yunnan Agricultural University,Kunming 650201，China

  • 3.

    Dali Tobacco Research Institute，Dali 671000，China

  • Abstract

    Tobacco vein distorting virus(TVDV)is one of the casual agents of tobacco bushy top disease． It was designated a tentative member of the family Luteoviridae． Partial sequence of the genome of rIvDV was amplified by RT-PCR from total RNA of tobacco affected with tobacco bushy top disease，using universal primers of Luteoviruses and degenerate primer of Poleroviruses．The 1 654 bp sequence of rIvDV genome encoded partial putative RNA-dependent RNA polymerase． coat protein and movement protein． Molecular phylogenetic trees were constructed based on the amino acid sequence of these three proteins．indicating that rIvDV should be a definitive memb er of the family Luteoviridae．According to the higher identities of amino acids of ORFs and the similar length of intergenic spacer region of rIvDV with the member of the genus Polerovirus．we proposed that rIvDV was a new member in the genus Polerovirus．Th is is the first report on the molecular properties of TVDV．

      Keywords:
    • Tobacco bushy top disease
    • , Tobacco vein distorting virus
    • , Phylogenetic tree

    通讯作者: 陈斌, bchen63@163.com

      沈阳化工大学材料科学与工程学院 沈阳 110142

    3. 万方数据库搜索 Link: http://s.wanfangdata.com.cn/Paper.aspx?q=%E4%BD%9C%E8%80%85%3A%E5%8F%B6%E7%A4%BA%E8%88%9F&f=top
    4. CNKI搜索 Link: http://scholar.cnki.net/result.aspx?q=%E4%BD%9C%E8%80%85%3A%28%E5%8F%B6%E7%A4%BA%E8%88%9F%29&rt=Journal&rl=&udb=

    Cloning and Analysis of Partial Genome Sequence of Tobacco vein distorting virus

    • MO Xiao , 
    • QIN Xi , 
    • YANG Cheng , 
    • DUAN Yu-qi , 
    • WU Juan , 
    • LI Tian-fei , 
    • WU Jian-yu , 
    • CHEN Hai-ru 2
    • 1. 1．Biotechnology Laboratory and Agricultural Institute of Yunnan Academy of Tobacco Science，Kunming 650106， China
    • 2. Key Laboratory ofPhytopathology，Yunnan Agricultural University,Kunming 650201，China
    • 3. Dali Tobacco Research Institute，Dali 671000，China

    Abstract: Tobacco vein distorting virus(TVDV)is one of the casual agents of tobacco bushy top disease． It was designated a tentative member of the family Luteoviridae． Partial sequence of the genome of rIvDV was amplified by RT-PCR from total RNA of tobacco affected with tobacco bushy top disease，using universal primers of Luteoviruses and degenerate primer of Poleroviruses．The 1 654 bp sequence of rIvDV genome encoded partial putative RNA-dependent RNA polymerase． coat protein and movement protein． Molecular phylogenetic trees were constructed based on the amino acid sequence of these three proteins．indicating that rIvDV should be a definitive memb er of the family Luteoviridae．According to the higher identities of amino acids of ORFs and the similar length of intergenic spacer region of rIvDV with the member of the genus Polerovirus．we proposed that rIvDV was a new member in the genus Polerovirus．Th is is the first report on the molecular properties of TVDV．
